title: Bug 49299 - Incorrect information about custom cookie name affecting URL rewriting
description: The bug report is about a discrepancy in Servlet 3.0 chapter 7.1.1 regarding the impact of custom cookie names on URL rewriting.
OB: The current behavior is not explicitly mentioned in the bug report.
EB: According to the expected result, if the phrase in 7.1.1 is followed correctly, the Reload link should be: http://localhost:8080/cookiename/index.jsp;MYSESSIONCOOKIE=658C60E714E9C7C833F4FDA366E0477F
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open a web browser.
2. Navigate to http://localhost:8080/cookiename/index.jsp.
3. Observe the URL of the Reload link.
